name: rundeck
description: Rundeck is a self-hosted automation platform for operations and DevOps teams. It provides scheduling, orchestration, and access control for running jobs and workflows via UI or API.
features: Job scheduling: Run automated tasks on schedules or triggers across infrastructure.
Workflow orchestration: Chain multiple commands and scripts into complex workflows.
Node management: Execute jobs across multiple servers from a central interface.
Access control: Define who can run, view, or modify jobs using role-based permissions.
Web UI: Create and manage jobs through an intuitive browser-based interface.
API integration: Trigger jobs and retrieve results programmatically via REST API.
Execution history: View logs and results from all previous job runs.
Notification system: Send alerts to Slack, email, or webhooks when jobs complete or fail.
Plugin architecture: Extend functionality with community or custom plugins.
SSH execution: Run commands on remote servers using SSH without manual login.
Variable support: Pass parameters to jobs for flexible, reusable automation.
Audit logging: Track who ran which jobs and when for compliance and troubleshooting.
